text: Food was a little bland in some cases, otherwise ok. Seating is spaced and is very intimate.
always dependable food, not phenomenal but always good and fun, bread could be better, as could wine list, and prices are reasonable
The cafe is simply not up to the same level as the museum, which is quite unfortunate. The food was poor and the service was worse.
Very authentic Italian cuisine in the Theatre district, right across the street from the Manhattan Theatre Club.
